protein.specific_function: JNK2 isoforms display different binding patterns:alpha- 1 and alpha-2 preferentially bind to c-Jun, whereas beta-1 and beta-2 bind to ATF2. However, there is no correlation between binding and phosphorylation, which is achieved at about the same efficiency by all isoforms. JUNB is not a substrate for JNK2 alpha-2, and JUND binds only weakly to it

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
